name: BOREX EX
description:
Quick Overview

Player  is in a spaceship

Goal is try to reach to rich beings in the spaceship to make a revolution and the most intelligent one is the captain that command everyone, so everyone tries to become the captain

Player is a robot

Player needs to solve puzzles

Player has to use the rail line
